participant_1.background:
My MacBook Pro is always there for me when I need to work on my dog blog.
my favorite musical is hamilton.
my dad is an airline pilot.
I enjoy my work as a software engineer, but it can be stressful
i want to get married again.

participant_2.background:
I want to stay close to my mom and my grandchildren.
My family and I have a special bond, even though I talk in my sleep.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
I miss my family but I enjoy my job and my hobbies.
My sunflowers are a source of pride for me, but my family's income comes from my job as a farmer.

content.text: Hamilton is my favorite musical. What about you?
I really enjoy Hamilton too! I am also a fan of Wicked.
Wicked is great! I have seen it multiple times.
I have seen Hamilton twice, but I am hoping to see it again soon.
That's great! I am a software engineer as well.
Oh, really? What kind of software do you work on?
I mostly work on web apps. What about you?
I work on a lot of different types of software. I like working on new projects.
That's awesome! I like working on new projects as well.
I like to build models. I am also a farmer.
That's cool! I am not sure I would be very good at building models.
It's not that hard. You just need to have patience.
I think I might have the patience to build a model.
I am sure you would do a great job
